messages.message:
hey @Mohit good question!

Wanted to keep this thread posted, Abhishek and I looked into the billing - and there was a significant  impact on them -
• Datadog: $12k
• GCP stackdriver: $1.5k 
As next steps we are looking at ways to detect anomalous usage increases so that these can be detected sooner and addressed. cc @shaunak @Heymian
